oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Fourth Avenue South at Lafayette Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Looking north toward downtown, the Life & Casualty Building, shown under construction, can be seen in this view of Fourth Avenue South and Lafayette Street. 35 mm
